Brand.prompt_ai: Identify if the brand belongs to Category1 or Category2.

Innovation.prompt_ai: Determine if the product is new, updated, or unchanged.

Category.prompt_ai: Classify the product into the correct category based on description.

Price.prompt_ai: Extract the price in standard format (e.g., $0.00).

Size.prompt_ai: Extract the product size in milliliters (e.g., 250 mL).
